ai-atk-abh03a0:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-atk-abh03a0:2_0: The account of the five spiritual powers
ai-atk-abh03a0:3_0: Discussion of the section on the legal procedure
ai-atk-abh03a0:4_0: There are eighteen bases for psychic power, Māra, the analysis of Māra.
ai-atk-abh03a0:5_0: I’ll teach you, so full of all these great hermits.
ai-atk-abh03a0:6_0: and he taught the elements of escape.
ai-atk-abh03a0:7_0: I shall listen to them, content with serene.
